channel.title: Algorithem on ZhangJincheng's Blogs

item.title: LeetCode
item.description: 1. 两数之和 法一： func twoSum(nums []int, target int) []int { var tmpMap = map[int]int{} for i, v := range nums { tmpMap[v] = i } for i, v := range nums { if pos, ok := tmpMap[target - v]; ok && pos != i{ nums[0] = i nums[1] = pos break; } } return nums[0:2] } 复杂度分析： 时间复
